Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of rosette and lotus flower in added white outlines with added red centres; top of rim glazed; exterior: billet pattern above z band between pairs of lines; below, part of complex cross and other undetermined filling ornament; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The number '38' is written in pencil on the sherd's exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0453) (phase 2)
